=== pre-conference hands-on workshop ===
cprofitt of worked with educators during a seven hour hands-on lab. The computer were loaded with Ubuntu 10.10 and several FOSS applications. Educators received instructions on how to use the applications and a project to complete with each. One of the projects was to create a time line of the Ubuntu distribution.

=== presentation ===

Free and Open in Education: ISTE and NETP 2010 was a discussion of how FOSS software, FOSS projects and Open Content can be leveraged by K-12 schools to meet the goals set out in NETP 2010 and ISTE 21st Century Skills.
